org.jacp.api.workbench
Interface IBase<L,A,M>

Type Parameters:
L - defines the action listener type
A - defines the basic action type
M - defines the basic message type
All Known Subinterfaces:
IWorkbench<C,L,A,M>
public interface IBase<L,A,M>

This Interface defines the basic root construct of an AHCP application, it has no dependencies to any UI

Author:
Andy Moncsek
